entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
